title: Easy Waterfall Pack (No Niagara) 5.3 and higher
description: Create realistic waterfalls in 15 mins (No Niagra)
longDescription:
Easy Waterfall Pack (No Niagara needed)

Are you looking for high quality modular waterfalls for your UE projects?

Check these:

https://youtu.be/lTbKvrkCqxg?si=o0ti2t00zEWNxfgZ

********

High quality water falls for Unreal Engine 5 and higher

No Niagara

All made with modular assets

Create waterfalls in 15 mins by combining modular assets

Easy Waterfall (No Niagara is used or needed)

Are you looking for high quality and performant waterfalls for your projects?

Are you looking for an easy way to create waterfalls without using Niagara?

Are you looking for modular assets that allow you to easily create waterfalls in 10-20 mins instead of weeks?

If your answer is yes, Then I have to say you are in the right page.

Easy waterfall is a set of modular assets that help you create high quality and detailed waterfalls in a few mins and save you weeks in this process.

You can easily combine these modular assets and create high quality and performant waterfalls. Since this package is NOT using Niagara itâ€™s so performant and memory efficient.

Also, you can easily art direct the waterfalls you create by these modular assets.

This package include:

A. More than 52 modular elements for creating realistic waterfalls

B. 7 Modular waterfalls to help you understand how you can create realistic waterfalls with this package

C. 7 Packed waterfalls ready for being used in your projects

D. One blueprint for creating the water on lens effect

E. A 17 min video that shows you how you can create realistic waterfalls with these modular assets

All the waterfalls in the demo video were created by Easy Water Fall Modular assets.


1 Blue print

20 Static Meshes

9 packed waterfalls (Static meshes)

9 master materials

28 textures

101 Material instances

4 decals


Before buying, please make sure you have checked the pictures and video that show this product results.

No refund request will be accepted after you buy this product.

If you buy this product and share it in your website for free, we will open a case in a court against you.

The Natural environment in the demo is NOT included in this package.

The Waterfall/Water sounds is Not included in this package.
technicalDetails:
Number of Unique Meshes: 28

Collision: No

Vertex Count: Less than 1000 for each waterfall

LODs: No (No Lods was needed)

Number of Materials and Material Instances:

8 master materials

102 Material instances

Number of Textures:

28 textures

Texture Resolutions: 1K,2K

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows
